about-text.1: I'm a Venezuelan Software Engineer living in Buenos Aires since 2019, in early 2020 my journey as a web developer began, from that day on, I've never stopped learning.
about-text.2: I love simple, clean and effective UI.
about-text.3: I Started learning about HTML, CSS and Javascript out of curiosity a and way to enter in the job market, but I discovered my passion in Web development.

cs-courses.title: ClimateScience Courses
cs-courses.description: A platform that offers free courses on climate change, with the aim of educating people on the topic.

cs-olympiad.title: ClimateScience Olympiad
cs-olympiad.description: An online competition that aims to demonstrate students' knowledge of climate change and its effects. We reached over 100.00 students in more than 100 countries.

cs-website.title: ClimateScience Website
cs-website.description: A platform that offers free education, with the aim of helping the fight against climate change. Over 1.000.000 users reached.

nggamdu.title: Nggam du
nggamdu.description: Spider divination with somié, Cameroon. A project developed together with Thomas Saraceno's team, an Argentinian Artist in Berlin.
